text: The Canadians is a 1961 British Canadian western movie directed by first time director Burt Kennedy and starring Robert Ryan, John Dehner, Torin Thatcher, Burt Metcalfe, John Sutton. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * *The Canadians at TCMDB Category:1961 movies Category:1960s Western (genre) movies Category:British Western (genre) movies Category:Canadian Western (genre) movies Category:Movies directed by Burt Kennedy
title: The Canadians (1961 movie)
